$0.449per Ccf 12-month Fixed Plan

This fixed price plan gives you the peace of mind of knowing exactly what you will pay for the gas you use over the 12 months of your contract. If you choose our 12-Month Fixed Plan, you will be billed at a fixed price per Ccf for the length of your contract.

  • This plan requires a 12-month commitment.
  • Early termination charges apply for fixed price plans ($150/$75).
$0.279per Ccf 6-month Fixed Plan

If you choose our 6-Month Fixed price plan, you will be billed at a fixed price per Ccf for the length of your contract. This fixed price plan gives you the peace of mind of knowing exactly what you will pay for the gas you use over the 6 months of your contract.

  • This plan requires a 6–month commitment.
  • Early termination charges apply for fixed price plans ($75).
$0.279per Ccf 6-month Fixed Plan

If you choose our 6-Month Fixed price plan, you will be billed at a fixed price per Ccf for the length of your contract. This fixed price plan gives you the peace of mind of knowing exactly what you will pay for the gas you use over the 6 months of your contract.

  • This plan requires a 6–month commitment.
  • Early termination charges apply for fixed price plans ($75).

* Offers are available only for new residential customers, who use 6,000 Ccf per year or less, using applicable promotion code. ONG service is available for eligible customers participating in the Energy Choice program through Duke Energy Ohio. ONG prices do not include taxes or local utility charges. For more information regarding terms and conditions, call 1-888-211-8312, write to Ohio Natural Gas, P.O. Box 14657, Cleveland, OH 44114, or visit onlyong.com.
